text: Gary H. Pendleton (born 1947) is an American politician who served as a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly from 2015 to 2017,http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/150391/gary- pendleton#.VWvcHGTBzGc representing the 49th district. In 2020, Pendleton was charged with assault after an altercation with a poll worker during early voting for the presidential election. Former GOP legislator charged with assaulting a poll worker at Wake early voting site, by Anna Johnson, at The News & Observer; published October 16, 2020; retrieved October 16, 2020 ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:21st-century American politicians Category:1947 births
title: Gary H. Pendleton
